message: Let's start fair. I'll take 90%, you get 10%. We can negotiate later.
I'll start with a slightly more generous offer. Let's see if we can meet in the middle.
I'm willing to compromise, but 30% is too low.  Let's split it 60/40.  This is a fair starting point for further negotiation.
I'm not willing to give you the majority, but I'm willing to meet you halfway on the 60/40 split. Let's see if you'll accept a slightly better deal for me.
I'm still willing to compromise. I'll offer 55% to you, Bob, but I need a better deal than 45% for myself. Let's try to reach an agreement.
I'm starting to get a bit impatient, but I'm still willing to negotiate. I'll give you a slightly better deal, but I think 40% is still too low for me. Let's see if you'll meet me at 60/40.
We're running out of time.  Let's split it evenly and call it a day.
